instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Stir together butter, sugar, and cinnamon in a small bowl. Brush tortillas with butter mixture, and cut each into 8 wedges. Arrange wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet, and bake until crisp, 10 to 12 minutes. Let chips cool on a wire rack before serving.
title: Cinnamon-Sugar Chips
